content: Give me a list of 20 verbs that end with 'ing'.

Sure! Here's a list of 20 verbs ending with "ing":

1. Running
2. Swimming
3. Dancing
4. Singing
5. Writing
6. Reading
7. Cooking
8. Shopping
9. Painting
10. Hiking
11. Fishing
12. Camping
13. Jogging
14. Cycling
15.skiing
16. Skiing
17. Snowboarding
18. Surfing
19. Photography
20. Gardening

I hope this helps! If you need any more assistance, feel free to ask.
